name: Fidget Widget - Keep Scrolling
description:
Feeling a bit fidgety? Then grab your beloved iPhone. The moment you start scrolling up and down; you can feel your anxiety disappearing into thin air. Fidget Widget is your ultimate partner in moments of boredom. Click open the app and scroll away fidgetiness.

Three different haptic feedbacks with four adjustable frequency modules to cater to your fidgety fingers.

WARNING : The excess use of this app cause battery drainage!

The features of this app is supported by only, iPhone 7 and onwards.
